means: 象形字（如古埃及等所用的）
秘密的或另有含意的书写符号

sentence.Network_en: Each picture, or hieroglyph, represents either an idea or a sound.
sentence.Network_cn: 每一图画或者每一个象形代表着一种想法或者一种声音.

sentence.Network_en: Also, the hieroglyph for " king's son " can be translated as'son - in - law " or " grandfather "
sentence.Network_cn: 此外, 象形文字 “ 国王的儿子 ” 还可译为 “ 女婿 ” 或 “ 祖父 ”

entry.tran: （尤指古埃及的）象形字，象形符号
entry.def: Hieroglyphs are symbols in the form of pictures, which are used in some writing systems, especially those of ancient Egypt.

means.word_mean: 1. writing that resembles hieroglyphics (usually by being illegible)
2. a writing system using picture symbols; used in ancient Egypt

auth_sentence.content: On your brows is written a mortal sentence, An hieroglyph of sorrow.
auth_sentence.res_content: On your brows is written a mortal sentence, An hieroglyph of sorrow.
